creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: a row of buildings with red roofs; human figure carrying large pack on back walks between two buildings at R; white center building has thatched roof and sits in front of a large barn with high pitched, red roof in back; green foliage in foreground, mountains and trees in background
markings: LRC: (red bird shaped seal); bottom center, in pencil: [39/187]
signed: LRC: [Micah]; LLC, in pencil: [Below the Duck Pond]; LRC, in pencil: [1982]
title: Below the Duck Pond
